001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Map;
008import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
009import java.util.Objects;
010import java.util.Optional;
011import java.util.Set;
012import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
013import java.util.function.BiFunction;
014import java.util.function.Function;
015import java.util.function.Supplier;
016
017import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
018
019import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.PropertyFunction;
020import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.PropertyGetter;
021import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.PropertyGetter.ChildPropertyGetter;
022import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.PropertyGetter.RequiredPropertyGetter;
023import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.PropertyGetter.RootPropertyGetter;
024import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.RequiredResult;
025import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.Result;
026import io.jstach.rainbowgum.annotation.CaseChanging;
027
028/**
029 * A single property or value.
030 */
031@CaseChanging
032public sealed interface LogProperty {
033
034        /**
035         * Builder
036         * @return property getter builder.
037         */
038        public static RootPropertyGetter builder() {
039                return Property.builder();
040        }
041
042        /**
043         * An error friendly {@link Function} for converting properties.
044         *
045         * @param <T> input type.
046         * @param <R> output type.
047         * @param <E> error type.
048         */
049        public interface PropertyFunction<T extends @Nullable Object, R extends @Nullable Object, E extends Exception>
050                        extends Function<T, R> {
051
052                @Override
053                default R apply(T t) {
054                        try {
055                                return _apply(t);
056                        }
057                        catch (Exception e) {
058                                sneakyThrow(e);
059                                throw new RuntimeException(e);
060                        }
061                }
062
063                /**
064                 * Apply that throws error.
065                 * @param t input
066                 * @return output
067                 * @throws E if an error happened in function.
068                 */
069                public R _apply(T t) throws E;
070
071                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
072                private static <E extends Throwable> void sneakyThrow(final Throwable x) throws E {
073                        throw (E) x;
074                }
075
076        }
077
078        /**
079         * Parent interface for property exceptions.
080         */
081        sealed interface PropertyProblem {
082
083        }
084
085        /**
086         * Thrown if an error happens while converting a property.
087         */
088        final static class PropertyConvertException extends RuntimeException implements PropertyProblem {
089
090                private static final long serialVersionUID = -6260241455268426342L;
091
092                /**
093                 * Key.
094                 */
095                private final String key;
096
097                /**
098                 * Creates convert exception.
099                 * @param key property key.
100                 * @param message error message
101                 * @param cause maybe null.
102                 */
103                PropertyConvertException(String key, String message, @Nullable Throwable cause) {
104                        super(message, cause);
105                        this.key = key;
106                }
107
108                /**
109                 * Property key.
110                 * @return key.
111                 */
112                public String key() {
113                        return this.key;
114                }
115
116        }
117
118        /**
119         * Throw if property is missing.
120         */
121        final static class PropertyMissingException extends NoSuchElementException implements PropertyProblem {
122
123                private static final long serialVersionUID = 4203076848052565692L;
124
125                /**
126                 * Creates a missing property exception.
127                 * @param s error message.
128                 */
129                PropertyMissingException(String s) {
130                        super(s);
131                }
132
133        }
134
135        /**
136         * The result of a property fetched from properties.
137         *
138         * @param <T> property type.
139         */
140        sealed interface Result<T> {
141
142                /**
143                 * Gets the value.
144                 * @return value or <code>null</code>.
145                 */
146                public @Nullable T valueOrNull();
147
148                /**
149                 * Gets a value if there is if not uses the fallback.
150                 * @param fallback maybe <code>null</code>.
151                 * @return value.
152                 */
153                default @Nullable T valueOrNull(@Nullable T fallback) {
154                        var v = valueOrNull();
155                        if (v != null) {
156                                return v;
157                        }
158                        return fallback;
159                }
160
161                /**
162                 * Gets the value and will fail with {@link NoSuchElementException} if there is no
163                 * value.
164                 * @return value.
165                 * @throws PropertyMissingException if there is no value.
166                 * @throws PropertyConvertException if the property failed conversion.
167                 */
168                public T value() throws PropertyMissingException, PropertyConvertException;
169
170                /**
171                 * Gets a value if there if not uses the fallback if not null otherwise throws an
172                 * exception.
173                 * @param fallback maybe <code>null</code>.
174                 * @return value.
175                 * @throws PropertyMissingException if no property and fallback is
176                 * <code>null</code>.
177                 * @throws PropertyConvertException if the property failed conversion.
178                 */
179                default T value(@Nullable T fallback) throws PropertyMissingException, PropertyConvertException {
180                        if (fallback == null) {
181                                return value();
182                        }
183                        return value(() -> fallback);
184                }
185
186                /**
187                 * Gets a value if there if not uses the fallback if not null otherwise throws an
188                 * exception.
189                 * @param fallback maybe <code>null</code>.
190                 * @return value.
191                 * @throws PropertyMissingException if no property and fallback is
192                 * <code>null</code>.
193                 * @throws PropertyConvertException if the property failed conversion.
194                 */
195                public T value(@SuppressWarnings("exports") Supplier<? extends @Nullable T> fallback)
196                                throws PropertyMissingException, PropertyConvertException;
197
198                /**
199                 * Convenience that turns a value into an optional.
200                 * @return optional.
201                 */
202                default Optional<T> optional() {
203                        return Optional.ofNullable(valueOrNull());
204                }
205
206                /**
207                 * A property that is present.
208                 *
209                 * @param <T> property type.
210                 * @param value actual value.
211                 */
212                public record Success<T>(T value) implements RequiredResult<T> {
213                        /**
214                         * Successfully found property value.
215                         * @param value actual value should not be <code>null</code>.
216                         */
217                        public Success {
218                                if (value == null) {
219                                        throw new NullPointerException("value");
220                                }
221                        }
222
223                        @Override
224                        public @Nullable T valueOrNull() {
225                                return value();
226                        }
227
228                        @Override
229                        public T value(@SuppressWarnings("exports") Supplier<? extends @Nullable T> fallback)
230                                        throws NoSuchElementException {
231                                return value;
232                        }
233                }
234
235                /**
236                 * A property that is missing (<code>null</code>).
237                 *
238                 * @param <T> property type.
239                 * @param message description of where the property is missing.
240                 */
241                public record Missing<T>(String message) implements Result<T> {
242                        @Override
243                        public @Nullable T valueOrNull() {
244                                return null;
245                        }
246
247                        @Override
248                        public T value() throws NoSuchElementException {
249                                throw new PropertyMissingException(message);
250                        }
251
252                        @Override
253                        public T value(@SuppressWarnings("exports") Supplier<? extends @Nullable T> fallback)
254                                        throws NoSuchElementException {
255                                var v = fallback.get();
256                                if (v != null) {
257                                        return v;
258                                }
259                                throw new PropertyMissingException(message);
260                        }
261
262                        /**
263                         * Helper just to cast the result to a different parameterized type.
264                         * @param <R> parameterized type.
265                         * @return this.
266                         */
267                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
268                        public <R> Missing<R> convert() {
269                                return (Missing<R>) this;
270                        }
271
272                }
273
274                /**
275                 * A property that was present but failed conversion.
276                 *
277                 * @param <T> property type.
278                 * @param key property key that failed to convert.
279                 * @param message failure message.
280                 * @param cause exception thrown while trying to convert.
281                 */
282                @SuppressWarnings("JavaLangClash")
283                public record Error<T>(String key, String message, Exception cause) implements RequiredResult<T> {
284                        /*
285                         * TODO consider rename to Failure
286                         */
287                        @Override
288                        public @Nullable T valueOrNull() {
289                                throw new PropertyConvertException(key, message, cause);
290                        }
291
292                        @Override
293                        public T value() throws NoSuchElementException {
294                                throw new PropertyConvertException(key, message, cause);
295                        }
296
297                        @Override
298                        public T value(@SuppressWarnings("exports") Supplier<? extends @Nullable T> fallback)
299                                        throws NoSuchElementException {
300                                throw new PropertyConvertException(key, message, cause);
301                        }
302
303                        /**
304                         * Helper just to cast the result to a different parameterized type.
305                         * @param <R> parameterized type.
306                         * @return this.
307                         */
308                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
309                        public <R> Error<R> convert() {
310                                return (Error<R>) this;
311                        }
312                }
313
314        }
315
316        /**
317         * A result that is not missing and will either be an error or success.
318         *
319         * @param <T> property type.
320         */
321        sealed interface RequiredResult<T> extends Result<T> {
322
323        }
324
325        /**
326         * A property description that can retrieve a property result by being passed
327         * {@link LogProperties}. <em>The property instance does not actually contain the
328         * value of the property!</em>.
329         *
330         * @param <T> property type.
331         * @see RequiredProperty
332         * @see Result
333         */
334        sealed interface Property<T> extends LogProperty {
335
336                /**
337                 * Gets the first key.
338                 * @return key.
339                 */
340                public String key();
341
342                /**
343                 * Gets a property value as a result.
344                 * @param properties key values.
345                 * @return result.
346                 */
347                public Result<T> get(LogProperties properties);
348
349                /**
350                 * Maps the property to another value type.
351                 * @param <U> value type.
352                 * @param mapper function to map.
353                 * @return property.
354                 */
355                public <U> Property<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper);
356
357                /**
358                 * Converts the value into a String that can be parsed by the built-in properties
359                 * parsing of types. Supported types: String, Boolean, Integer, URI, Map, List.
360                 * @param value to be converted to string.
361                 * @return property representation of value.
362                 */
363                public String propertyString(T value);
364
365                /**
366                 * Set a property if its not null.
367                 * @param value value to set.
368                 * @param consumer first parameter is first key and second parameter is non null
369                 * value.
370                 */
371                public void set(T value, BiConsumer<String, T> consumer);
372
373                /**
374                 * Programmatically check if a value that corresponds to this property is not
375                 * null.
376                 * @param value maybe <code>null</code> but an exception will be thrown if it is.
377                 * @return value if not null.
378                 * @throws NoSuchElementException if the value is null.
379                 * @apiNote this is an expected exception and should not be treated as crash-able
380                 * exception that should avoided with static analysis such as Checker Framework
381                 * and is why the input argument is nullable.
382                 */
383                default T require(@Nullable T value) {
384                        if (value == null) {
385                                throw new PropertyMissingException("Value is required not null. property key='" + key() + "'");
386                        }
387                        return value;
388                }
389
390                /**
391                 * Builder.
392                 * @return builder.
393                 */
394                public static RootPropertyGetter builder() {
395                        return PropertyGetter.of();
396                }
397
398        }
399
400        /**
401         * Property Builder that can have keys added to try.
402         *
403         * @param <T> value type.
404         */
405        final class PropertyBuilder<T> {
406
407                private final List<String> keys = new ArrayList<>();
408
409                private final PropertyGetter<T> getter;
410
411                private PropertyBuilder(String key, PropertyGetter<T> getter) {
412                        keys.add(key);
413                        this.getter = getter;
414                }
415
416                /**
417                 * Adds an additional key to try.
418                 * @param key key to try.
419                 * @return this
420                 */
421                public PropertyBuilder<T> addKey(String key) {
422                        keys.add(key);
423                        return this;
424                }
425
426                /**
427                 * Adds a key with a <code>{name}</code> parameter.
428                 * @param key key to be interpolated.
429                 * @param name name.
430                 * @return this
431                 */
432                public PropertyBuilder<T> addKeyWithName(String key, String name) {
433                        var parameters = Map.of(LogProperties.NAME, name);
434                        LogProperties.validateKeyParameters(key, parameters.keySet());
435                        String fqn = LogProperties.interpolateKey(key, parameters);
436                        return addKey(fqn);
437                }
438
439                /**
440                 * Builds the property with the supplied keys.
441                 * @return property
442                 */
443                public Property<T> build() {
444                        return getter.build(keys.get(0), keys.subList(1, keys.size()).toArray(new String[] {}));
445                }
446
447        }
448
449        /**
450         * A property that should never be missing usually because there is non-null fallback.
451         *
452         * @param <T> property type.
453         */
454        sealed interface RequiredProperty<T> extends Property<T> {
455
456                /**
457                 * Gets a property value as a result.
458                 * @param properties key values.
459                 * @return result.
460                 */
461                @Override
462                public RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties properties);
463
464                /**
465                 * Maps the property to another value type.
466                 * @param <U> value type.
467                 * @param mapper function to map.
468                 * @return property.
469                 */
470                @Override
471                public <U> RequiredProperty<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper);
472
473        }
474
475        /**
476         * Extracts and converts from {@link LogProperties} and is also an immutable builder
477         * for {@link Property}s.
478         *
479         * @param <T> value type.
480         */
481        sealed interface PropertyGetter<T> {
482
483                /**
484                 * Gets a result from properties.
485                 * @param props properties.
486                 * @param key property key usually dotted.
487                 * @return result.
488                 */
489                Result<T> get(LogProperties props, String key);
490
491                /**
492                 * Gets a result from properties by trying a list of keys.
493                 * @param props properties.
494                 * @param keys list of property keys usually dotted.
495                 * @return result.
496                 */
497                default Result<T> get(LogProperties props, List<String> keys) {
498                        for (String key : keys) {
499                                var r = get(props, key);
500                                @SuppressWarnings("null") // TODO eclipse bug
501                                @Nullable
502                                Result<T> found = switch (r) {
503                                        case Result.Success<T> s -> s;
504                                        case Result.Error<T> s -> s;
505                                        case Result.Missing<T> s -> null;
506                                };
507                                if (found != null) {
508                                        return found;
509                                }
510                        }
511                        return findRoot(this).missingResult(props, keys);
512                }
513
514                /**
515                 * Converts the value into a String that can be parsed by the built-in properties
516                 * parsing of types. Supported types: String, Boolean, Integer, URI, Map, List.
517                 * @param value to be converted to string.
518                 * @return property representation of value.
519                 */
520                String propertyString(T value);
521
522                /**
523                 * Determines full name of key.
524                 * @param key key.
525                 * @return fully qualified key name.
526                 */
527                default String fullyQualifiedKey(String key) {
528                        return findRoot(this).fullyQualifiedKey(key);
529                }
530
531                /**
532                 * Validates the key is correctly prefixed.
533                 * @param key dotted key.
534                 */
535                default void validateKey(String key) {
536                        String fqn = fullyQualifiedKey(key);
537                        if (!fqn.startsWith(LogProperties.ROOT_PREFIX)) {
538                                throw new IllegalArgumentException(
539                                                "Property key should start with: '" + LogProperties.ROOT_PREFIX + "'. key = " + key);
540                        }
541                        if (fqn.endsWith(".") || fqn.startsWith(".")) {
542                                throw new IllegalArgumentException(
543                                                "Property key should not start or end with '" + LogProperties.SEP + "'");
544                        }
545                        LogProperties.validateKeyParameters(key, Set.of());
546                }
547
548                /**
549                 * Creates a property builder with the given first key.
550                 * @param key first key to try.
551                 * @return builder to add more keys.
552                 */
553                default PropertyBuilder<T> withKey(String key) {
554                        return new PropertyBuilder<>(key, this);
555                }
556
557                /**
558                 * Creates a Property from the given key and this getter.
559                 * @param key key.
560                 * @return property.
561                 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key is malformed.
562                 */
563                default Property<T> build(String key) throws IllegalArgumentException {
564                        validateKey(key);
565                        return new DefaultProperty<>(this, List.of(key));
566                }
567
568                /**
569                 * Creates a Property from the given key and this getter.
570                 * @param key key.
571                 * @param otherKeys additional keys to try.
572                 * @return property.
573                 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key is malformed.
574                 */
575                default Property<T> build(String key, String... otherKeys) throws IllegalArgumentException {
576                        List<String> keys = combine(key, otherKeys);
577                        for (var k : keys) {
578                                validateKey(k);
579                        }
580                        return new DefaultProperty<>(this, keys);
581                }
582
583                private static List<String> combine(String key, String... otherKeys) {
584                        List<String> keys = new ArrayList<>();
585                        keys.add(key);
586                        for (var o : otherKeys) {
587                                keys.add(o);
588                        }
589                        return keys.stream().distinct().toList();
590                }
591
592                /**
593                 * Creates a Property from the given key and its {@value LogProperties#NAME}
594                 * parameter.
595                 * @param key key.
596                 * @param name interpolates <code>{name}</code> in property name with this value.
597                 * @return property.
598                 */
599                default Property<T> buildWithName(String key, String name) {
600                        var parameters = Map.of(LogProperties.NAME, name);
601                        LogProperties.validateKeyParameters(key, parameters.keySet());
602                        String fqn = LogProperties.interpolateKey(key, parameters);
603                        return build(fqn);
604                }
605
606                /**
607                 * Find root property getter.
608                 * @param e property getter.
609                 * @return root.
610                 */
611                @SuppressWarnings("null") // TODO eclipse bug
612                public static RootPropertyGetter findRoot(PropertyGetter<?> e) {
613                        return switch (e) {
614                                case RootPropertyGetter r -> r;
615                                case ChildPropertyGetter<?> c -> findRoot(c.parent());
616                        };
617                }
618
619                /**
620                 * Default root property getter.
621                 * @return property getter.
622                 */
623                public static RootPropertyGetter of() {
624                        return new RootPropertyGetter("", false);
625                }
626
627                /**
628                 * A property getter and <strong>builder</strong> that has no conversion but may
629                 * prefix the key and search recursively up the key path.
630                 * <p>
631                 * While you can map the string properties with {@link #map(PropertyFunction)} it
632                 * is preferred to use the <code>to</code> methods on this class for basic types
633                 * especially for list or map types as the implementation will call the
634                 * implementation specific in LogProperties. An example is {@link #toMap()} which
635                 * will call the LogProperties implementation of
636                 * {@link LogProperties#mapOrNull(String)}.
637                 *
638                 * @param prefix added to the key before looking up in {@link LogProperties}.
639                 * @param search if true will recursively search up the key path
640                 */
641                record RootPropertyGetter(String prefix, boolean search) implements PropertyGetter<String> {
642
643                        // @Override
644                        private @Nullable String valueOrNull(LogProperties props, String key) {
645                                if (search) {
646                                        return props.findOrNull(prefix, key);
647                                }
648                                return props.valueOrNull(fullyQualifiedKey(key));
649                        }
650
651                        private <T> @Nullable T valueOrNull(LogProperties props, String key,
652                                        BiFunction<LogProperties, String, @Nullable T> func) {
653                                if (search) {
654                                        return props.findOrNull(prefix, key, func);
655                                }
656                                return func.apply(props, fullyQualifiedKey(key));
657                        }
658
659                        <T> Result<T> get(LogProperties props, String key, BiFunction<LogProperties, String, @Nullable T> func) {
660                                var v = valueOrNull(props, key, func);
661                                if (v == null) {
662                                        return missingResult(props, List.of(key));
663                                }
664                                return new Result.Success<>(v);
665                        }
666
667                        @Override
668                        public Result<String> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
669                                var v = valueOrNull(props, key);
670                                if (v == null) {
671                                        return missingResult(props, List.of(key));
672                                }
673                                return new Result.Success<>(v);
674                        }
675
676                        @Override
677                        public String propertyString(String value) {
678                                return value;
679                        }
680
681                        <T> Result.Error<T> errorResult(LogProperties props, String key, Exception e) {
682                                String resolvedKey = props.description(fullyQualifiedKey(key));
683                                String message = "Error for property. key: '" + resolvedKey + "', " + e.getMessage();
684                                return new Result.Error<>(resolvedKey, message, e);
685                        }
686
687                        <T> Result.Missing<T> missingResult(LogProperties props, List<String> keys) {
688                                List<String> resolvedKeys = describeKeys(props, keys);
689                                String message = "Property missing. keys: " + resolvedKeys;
690                                return new Result.Missing<>(message);
691                        }
692
693                        List<String> describeKeys(LogProperties props, List<String> keys) {
694                                return keys.stream().map(k -> props.description(fullyQualifiedKey(k))).toList();
695                        }
696
697                        /**
698                         * Will search with prefix.
699                         * @param prefix prefix.
700                         * @return new property getter.
701                         */
702                        public RootPropertyGetter withSearch(String prefix) {
703                                return new RootPropertyGetter(prefix, true);
704                        }
705
706                        /**
707                         * Will prefix key.
708                         * @param prefix prefix.
709                         * @return new property getter.
710                         */
711                        public RootPropertyGetter withPrefix(String prefix) {
712                                return new RootPropertyGetter(prefix, search);
713                        }
714
715                        @Override
716                        public String fullyQualifiedKey(String key) {
717                                return LogProperties.concatKey(prefix, key);
718                        }
719
720                        /**
721                         * An integer property getter.
722                         * @return getter that will convert to integers.
723                         */
724                        public PropertyGetter<Integer> toInt() {
725                                return new FuncGetter<>(this, Integer::parseInt, String::valueOf);
726                        }
727
728                        /**
729                         * A boolean property getter.
730                         * @return getter that will convert to boolean.
731                         */
732                        public PropertyGetter<Boolean> toBoolean() {
733                                return new FuncGetter<>(this, Boolean::parseBoolean, String::valueOf);
734                        }
735
736                        /**
737                         * A Map property that will use {@link LogProperties#mapOrNull(String)}.
738                         * @return getter that will convert string property to a Map.
739                         */
740                        public PropertyGetter<Map<String, String>> toMap() {
741                                return new MapGetter(this);
742                        }
743
744                        /**
745                         * A list property that will use {@link LogProperties#listOrNull(String)}.
746                         * @return getter that will convert string property to a List.
747                         */
748                        public PropertyGetter<List<String>> toList() {
749                                return new ListGetter(this);
750                        }
751
752                        /**
753                         * An enum property getter using {@link Enum#valueOf(Class, String)}.
754                         * @param <T> enum type.
755                         * @param enumClass enum class.
756                         * @return getter that will convert to enum type.
757                         */
758                        public <T extends Enum<T>> PropertyGetter<T> toEnum(Class<T> enumClass) {
759                                return new FuncGetter<>(this, s -> Enum.valueOf(enumClass, s), String::valueOf);
760                        }
761
762                        /**
763                         * A URI property getter that parses URIs.
764                         * @return getter that will parse URIs.
765                         */
766                        public PropertyGetter<URI> toURI() {
767                                return new FuncGetter<>(this, URI::new, String::valueOf);
768                        }
769
770                }
771
772                /**
773                 * Mapped property getter.
774                 *
775                 * @param <T> will convert to this type.
776                 */
777                public sealed interface ChildPropertyGetter<T> extends PropertyGetter<T> {
778
779                        /**
780                         * Parent.
781                         * @return parent.
782                         */
783                        PropertyGetter<?> parent();
784
785                        @SuppressWarnings("null") // TODO eclipse bug
786                        @Override
787                        default String propertyString(T value) {
788                                return switch (value) {
789                                        case null -> throw new NullPointerException("null value passed into propertyString");
790                                        case String s -> s;
791                                        case Boolean b -> String.valueOf(b);
792                                        case Integer i -> String.valueOf(i);
793                                        case URI u -> String.valueOf(u);
794                                        case Map<?, ?> m -> MapGetter._propertyString(m);
795                                        case List<?> list -> ListGetter._propertyString(list);
796                                        default -> throw new RuntimeException("Unable to convert to property string. value = " + value);
797                                };
798                        }
799
800                }
801
802                /**
803                 * Sets up to converts a value.
804                 * @param <U> value type
805                 * @param mapper function.
806                 * @return new property getter.
807                 */
808                default <U> PropertyGetter<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
809                        return new FuncGetter<T, U>(this, mapper, null);
810                }
811
812                /**
813                 * Fallback to value if property not found.
814                 * @param fallback fallback value.
815                 * @return new property getter.
816                 */
817                default RequiredPropertyGetter<T> orElse(T fallback) {
818                        if (fallback == null) {
819                                throw new NullPointerException();
820                        }
821                        return new FallbackGetter<T>(this, () -> fallback);
822                }
823
824                /**
825                 * Fallback to value if property not found.
826                 * @param fallback supplier.
827                 * @return new property getter.
828                 */
829                default RequiredPropertyGetter<T> orElseGet(Supplier<? extends T> fallback) {
830                        Objects.requireNonNull(fallback, "fallback");
831                        return new FallbackGetter<T>(this, fallback);
832                }
833
834                /**
835                 * A property getter that guarantees the result will not be missing usually
836                 * because a non-null fallback is provided somewhere.
837                 *
838                 * @param <T> property type.
839                 */
840                public sealed interface RequiredPropertyGetter<T> extends ChildPropertyGetter<T> {
841
842                        /**
843                         * This call unlike the parent returns a required result. {@inheritDoc}
844                         */
845                        @Override
846                        RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, String key);
847
848                        /**
849                         * Gets a result from properties by trying a list of keys.
850                         * @param props properties.
851                         * @param keys list of property keys usually dotted.
852                         * @return result.
853                         */
854                        @Override
855                        default RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, List<String> keys) {
856                                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
857                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Keys is empty");
858                                }
859                                String key = keys.getFirst();
860                                return get(props, key);
861                        }
862
863                        /**
864                         * Sets up to converts a value.
865                         * @param <U> value type
866                         * @param mapper function.
867                         * @return new property getter.
868                         */
869                        @Override
870                        default <U> RequiredPropertyGetter<U> map(
871                                        PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
872                                return new RequiredFuncGetter<T, U>(this, mapper, null);
873                        }
874
875                        /**
876                         * Creates a Property from the given key and this getter.
877                         * @param key key.
878                         * @return property.
879                         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key is malformed.
880                         */
881                        @Override
882                        default RequiredProperty<T> build(String key) throws IllegalArgumentException {
883                                validateKey(key);
884                                return new DefaultRequiredProperty<>(this, List.of(key));
885                        }
886
887                        /**
888                         * Creates a Property from the given key and its {@value LogProperties#NAME}
889                         * parameter.
890                         * @param key key.
891                         * @param name interpolates <code>{name}</code> in property name with this
892                         * value.
893                         * @return property.
894                         */
895                        @Override
896                        default RequiredProperty<T> buildWithName(String key, String name) {
897                                var parameters = Map.of(LogProperties.NAME, name);
898                                LogProperties.validateKeyParameters(key, parameters.keySet());
899                                String fqn = LogProperties.interpolateKey(key, parameters);
900                                return build(fqn);
901                        }
902
903                        /**
904                         * Creates a Property from the given key and this getter.
905                         * @param key key.
906                         * @param otherKeys other keys to try.
907                         * @return property.
908                         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the key is malformed.
909                         */
910                        @Override
911                        default RequiredProperty<T> build(String key, String... otherKeys) throws IllegalArgumentException {
912                                List<String> keys = combine(key, otherKeys);
913                                for (var k : keys) {
914                                        validateKey(k);
915                                }
916                                return new DefaultRequiredProperty<>(this, keys);
917                        }
918
919                }
920
921        }
922
923}
924
925record DefaultProperty<T>(PropertyGetter<T> propertyGetter, List<String> keys) implements LogProperty.Property<T> {
926
927        public DefaultProperty {
928                Objects.requireNonNull(propertyGetter);
929                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
930                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("should have at least one key");
931                }
932        }
933
934        /**
935         * Gets the first key.
936         * @return key.
937         */
938        @Override
939        public String key() {
940                return keys.get(0);
941        }
942
943        @Override
944        public Result<T> get(LogProperties properties) {
945                return propertyGetter.get(properties, keys);
946        }
947
948        @Override
949        public <U> LogProperty.Property<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
950                return new DefaultProperty<>(propertyGetter.map(mapper), keys);
951        }
952
953        @Override
954        public String propertyString(T value) {
955                return propertyGetter.propertyString(value);
956        }
957
958        @Override
959        public void set(T value, BiConsumer<String, T> consumer) {
960                if (value != null) {
961                        consumer.accept(key(), value);
962                }
963        }
964
965}
966
967record DefaultRequiredProperty<T>(RequiredPropertyGetter<T> propertyGetter,
968                List<String> keys) implements LogProperty.RequiredProperty<T> {
969
970        public DefaultRequiredProperty {
971                Objects.requireNonNull(propertyGetter);
972                if (keys.isEmpty()) {
973                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("should have at least one key");
974                }
975        }
976
977        /**
978         * Gets the first key.
979         * @return key.
980         */
981        @Override
982        public String key() {
983                return keys.get(0);
984        }
985
986        @Override
987        public RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties properties) {
988                return propertyGetter.get(properties, keys);
989        }
990
991        @Override
992        public <U> LogProperty.RequiredProperty<U> map(PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends U, ? super Exception> mapper) {
993                return new DefaultRequiredProperty<>(propertyGetter.map(mapper), keys);
994        }
995
996        @Override
997        public String propertyString(T value) {
998                return propertyGetter.propertyString(value);
999        }
1000
1001        @Override
1002        public void set(T value, BiConsumer<String, T> consumer) {
1003                if (value != null) {
1004                        consumer.accept(key(), value);
1005                }
1006        }
1007
1008}
1009
1010enum NoProperty implements LogProperty {
1011
1012}
1013
1014record FallbackGetter<T>(PropertyGetter<T> parent,
1015                Supplier<? extends T> fallback) implements RequiredPropertyGetter<T> {
1016
1017        @SuppressWarnings("null") // TODO eclipse bug
1018        @Override
1019        public RequiredResult<T> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
1020                var r = parent.get(props, key);
1021                RequiredResult<T> req = switch (r) {
1022                        case Result.Missing<T> m -> {
1023                                var f = fallback.get();
1024                                if (f == null) {
1025                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent) //
1026                                                .errorResult(props, key, new LogProperty.PropertyMissingException("fallback returned null"));
1027                                }
1028                                yield new Result.Success<>(f);
1029                        }
1030                        case Result.Success<T> s -> s;
1031                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e;
1032                };
1033                return req;
1034        }
1035
1036        @Override
1037        public String propertyString(T value) {
1038                return parent.propertyString(value);
1039        }
1040
1041}
1042
1043record MapGetter(RootPropertyGetter parent) implements ChildPropertyGetter<Map<String, String>> {
1044
1045        @Override
1046        public Result<Map<String, String>> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
1047                return parent.get(props, key, (p, k) -> p.mapOrNull(k));
1048        }
1049
1050        @Override
1051        public String propertyString(Map<String, String> value) {
1052                return _propertyString(value);
1053        }
1054
1055        static String _propertyString(Map<?, ?> value) {
1056                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
1057                boolean first = true;
1058                for (var e : value.entrySet()) {
1059                        if (first) {
1060                                first = true;
1061                        }
1062                        else {
1063                                sb.append("&");
1064                        }
1065                        PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(e.getKey()), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
1066                        Object v = e.getValue();
1067                        if (v != null) {
1068                                sb.append("=");
1069                                PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(v), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
1070                        }
1071                }
1072                return sb.toString();
1073        }
1074
1075}
1076
1077record ListGetter(RootPropertyGetter parent) implements ChildPropertyGetter<List<String>> {
1078
1079        @Override
1080        public Result<List<String>> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
1081                return parent.get(props, key, (p, k) -> p.listOrNull(k));
1082        }
1083
1084        @Override
1085        public String propertyString(List<String> list) {
1086                return _propertyString(list);
1087        }
1088
1089        static String _propertyString(List<?> list) {
1090                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
1091                boolean first = true;
1092                for (var e : list) {
1093                        if (first) {
1094                                first = true;
1095                        }
1096                        else {
1097                                sb.append(",");
1098                        }
1099                        PercentCodec.encode(sb, String.valueOf(e), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
1100                }
1101                return sb.toString();
1102        }
1103
1104}
1105
1106record FuncGetter<T, R>(PropertyGetter<T> parent, PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends R, ? super Exception> mapper,
1107                @Nullable PropertyFunction<? super R, ? extends String, ? super Exception> stringFunc)
1108                implements
1109                        ChildPropertyGetter<R> {
1110
1111        @Override
1112        public Result<R> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
1113                var result = parent.get(props, key);
1114                return switch (result) {
1115                        case Result.Success<T> s -> {
1116                                try {
1117                                        R r = mapper._apply(s.value());
1118                                        if (r == null) {
1119                                                yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).missingResult(props, List.of(key));
1120                                        }
1121                                        yield new Result.Success<>(r);
1122                                }
1123                                catch (Exception e) {
1124                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).errorResult(props, key, e);
1125                                }
1126                        }
1127                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e.convert();
1128                        case Result.Missing<T> m -> m.convert();
1129                };
1130        }
1131
1132        @Override
1133        public String propertyString(R value) {
1134                var f = stringFunc;
1135                if (f != null) {
1136                        return f.apply(value);
1137                }
1138                return ChildPropertyGetter.super.propertyString(value);
1139        }
1140
1141}
1142
1143record RequiredFuncGetter<T, R>(RequiredPropertyGetter<T> parent,
1144                PropertyFunction<? super T, ? extends R, ? super Exception> mapper,
1145                @Nullable PropertyFunction<? super R, ? extends String, ? super Exception> stringFunc)
1146                implements
1147                        RequiredPropertyGetter<R> {
1148
1149        @Override
1150        public RequiredResult<R> get(LogProperties props, String key) {
1151                var result = parent.get(props, key);
1152                return switch (result) {
1153                        case Result.Success<T> s -> {
1154                                try {
1155                                        R r = mapper._apply(s.value());
1156                                        if (r == null) {
1157                                                throw new NullPointerException(
1158                                                                "The property function returned a null. props=" + props + ", key=" + key);
1159                                        }
1160                                        yield new Result.Success<>(r);
1161                                }
1162                                catch (Exception e) {
1163                                        yield PropertyGetter.findRoot(parent).errorResult(props, key, e);
1164                                }
1165                        }
1166                        case Result.Error<T> e -> e.convert();
1167                };
1168        }
1169
1170        @Override
1171        public String propertyString(R value) {
1172                var f = stringFunc;
1173                if (f != null) {
1174                        return f.apply(value);
1175                }
1176                return RequiredPropertyGetter.super.propertyString(value);
1177        }
1178
1179}
